hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Red Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #stable#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Map of the Water Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kokiri Shop#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
